input.idea: Real-time inventory forecasting tool for Shopify sellers (£500K-£5M annual revenue) that uses ML to predict stockouts 3 weeks in advance, reducing lost sales by 25% and overstock waste by 30% through Amazon FBA and 3PL integrations.
input.targetMarket: UK and EU Shopify merchants with £500K-£5M annual revenue, selling 50-500 SKUs through multi-channel (own site + Amazon + eBay), using 3PL fulfillment
input.problemStatement: Manual inventory management causes frequent stockouts (losing 25% potential sales) and overstock waste (tying up 30% of cash in dead inventory), especially during seasonal peaks
input.solutionHypothesis: ML forecasting using 2 years of sales data + seasonal trends + marketing campaign calendars predicts demand 3 weeks ahead, optimizing reorder points automatically

requiredElements: Specific metrics (25% lost sales, 30% overstock, 3 weeks prediction)

qualityChecks.specificity: Should mention £500K-£5M revenue, 50-500 SKUs, 25% lost sales, 3-week prediction
qualityChecks.geographic: Must identify UK/EU markets, multi-channel selling (Amazon, eBay)
qualityChecks.actionability: Describe HOW it works (ML forecasting, 2 years data, seasonal trends, campaign integration)
qualityChecks.avoidGeneric: No 'helps manage inventory' - must specify stockout prediction, overstock reduction metrics
